Package game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
game.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bot
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the labyrinth.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Player(String nome, Divisao inicio)
    Creates a new player with the given name and starting division.
